iShares Robotics and Artificial Intelligence ETF (NYSEARCA:IRBO) Stock Price Down 0.1%
Shares of iShares Robotics and Artificial Intelligence ETF (NYSEARCA:IRBO) traded down 0.1% during trading on Monday . The company traded as low as $28.74 and last traded at $28.80, 26,336 shares changed hands during mid-day trading. A decline of 33% from the average session volume of 39,142 shares. The stock had previously closed at $28.84.
